name: Ship Saviour
description:
In this game, you need to help the ship with your tiny little boat.

The rules are simple:

  • Use AWSD or Arrows to move
  • Click on the ship to drag
  • Drag the ship until the yellow zone

Special thanks to:

  • Trees: qubodup, Bart K., Blarumyrran
  • Terrain blocks: Devilswork
  • GUI and boats: Kenney
  • Background art: @CaniaEast
  • Enviroment sound: BurghRecords
  • Boat fsx: Pfannkuchn
